name: Boolean's Cube
description:
Description:

Boolean's Cube is a cube runner game. Control the cube and help it to reach the finish line without colliding with the obstacles. Boolean's Cube, the protagonist only know one thing and that is- Red is good, everything else is bad! 

Controls:

There are only 2 controls in the game- Left & Right.

Touch Left of the screen to go Left and  Right of the screen to go Right.

Either hold the touch to keep going in the given direction or touch Left & Right quickly to maneuver around obstacles.

A little about me:

I'm learning game development and this is my first game. I will love to hear what you have to say about this game, so feel free to comment your thoughts down below.
